text: Isaías Pérez Saldaña (28 June 1949 – 27 October 2021) was a Spanish politician. He was a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party. He was in the Parliament of Andalusia from 1990 to 2008 and was Mayor of Ayamonte from 1991 to 1996. Pérez Saldaña died on 27 October 2021 in Seville, Spain at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish politicians
title: Isaías Pérez Saldaña
